Package com.lvg.grandao_biblioteca.modelo.dao

Interface AutorRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Autor,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Autor,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Autor,String>, org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<Autor,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Autor,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Autor>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Autor,String>
All Known Implementing Classes:
Autor, AutorController
public interface AutorRepository extends org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<Autor,String>
Repositorio para realizar operaciones CRUD sobre los autores en la base de datos. Extiende de MongoRepository para manejar la persistencia en MongoDB.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lucas Villa (k4ts0v@protonmail.com)
